elementSpec.desc: contains text of a complete start- or end-tag, possibly including attribute specifications, but excluding the opening and closing markup delimiter characters.
記述されるタグをそのまま示す．但し，タグ開始区切子，タグ終了区切子は書かない．

attDef.desc: supplies the name of the scheme in which this name is defined.
当該タグ名が規定されているスキームを示す．例えば，TEIなど．

valItem.gloss: this tag is part of the TEI scheme.
this element is part of the Docbook scheme.

exemplum.egXML: Mark the start of each italicised phrase with a hi rend="it" tag, and its end with a /hi tag.
